title: Doomsayer

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- To curse your targets, you must guess all three of their subalignments (Investigative, Support etc.)
- A cursed player will flipped clean when killed. Their will will be missing.
- If any of your targets are not town, you will be told they were deceiving you. They will only be cleaned until the following night passes.
- You will be aware of the roles of dead players you have cleaned.
- You can only curse each player once.
- You have a one-time Basic autovest.
- Your creator is Story to the (6) Investicreator
